sections.title: What is Satispay and how does the bonus work
content: Satispay is a free wallet app that enables fast, secure digital payments in physical stores, online shops, and among friends.
By signing up and making a minimum €5 purchase within 30 days, you’ll receive a €5 welcome bonus to use for spending or transfers.
During special Super Promo events, which last only a few days each month, the referral bonus per invited friend can go up to €50.
Identity verification with a valid document and selfie is required to activate the account.

sections.title: Requirements to receive the bonus
content: Register using the official link or by entering the public promo code shown on this page.
Complete the KYC process by uploading your ID (paper or electronic) or passport, along with a selfie.
Make at least one payment with Satispay (in-store, online, or within the app) within 30 days of signing up.
For each friend who signs up using your code and makes their first purchase, you’ll earn a bonus — typically €5, but up to €50 during Super Promo periods.
You can invite an unlimited number of friends.

sections.title: Step-by-step guide to register and unlock the bonus
content: 1. Sign up on an Android or iOS device using the referral link or by entering the promo code listed on this page.
2. Upload a valid ID and take the required selfie to complete the identity verification process.
3. Link a bank account (IBAN); in some cases, small verification deposits may be required.
4. Make a purchase with Satispay within 30 days of registration — even a few cents is enough.
5. Your €5 bonus will be credited immediately after the first purchase.
6. Share your public referral code (shown at the top of this page) to invite friends and earn extra bonuses.
7. During Super Promo events, referral bonuses are significantly increased for each friend who joins and completes the first payment.

sections.title: Other useful information about Satispay
content: The bonus can be freely spent or withdrawn without restrictions.
You can transfer funds to your linked bank account at any time for free.
If you didn’t enter a promo code during sign-up, you can still add it within two days from your profile settings.
The platform uses strong encryption and two-factor authentication to ensure maximum security.
Stay up to date on Super Promo events by checking the official page and our site regularly.
